title: Urbanization in Malaysia 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: In general Share of urban population in total population has stayed the same over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 75.45 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 72.28 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2017.
mid_summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
